text:
The great thing about gift sets for dads, who are notorious for “not wanting anything,” is that an assortment of little bits and bobs means chances are that he’ll find at least one of them useful. Here, we’ve rounded up the best gift sets for a whole range of fussy dads for Father’s Day, whether they’re wine lovers, golf dads, Wall Street guys, or partial to a white sneaker.

For the Dad Whose Tolerance Isn’t What It Used to Be

For the Dad Who Grows His Own Veg

For the Dad Who Weeds

Hori Hori Garden Knife Gift Set $29 (was $40, now 28% off) A stainless-steel Japanese blade that will take the strain off his hands, whether he’s weeding or pruning. It comes with a sharpening stone, so it can keep its edge, too. $29 at Amazon Buy $29 at Amazon Buy

For the Dad Who’s a Vinyl Devotee

For the Dad Who’s Into Skin Care Now

Malin + Goetz Skincare Essentials Kit Get him a trio of elevated basics from Malin + Goetz that you’d be equally happy to receive: an invigorating grapefruit cleanser, some lip balm, and a vitamin E moisturizer. $80 at Amazon Buy $80 at Amazon Buy

For the Dad Who’s Really Into Skin Care Now

For the Dad Who Thinks He’s PGA-Worthy

For the Dad Who’s Growing it Out

For the Dad Who Wants to Read the Books Now

A Game of Thrones Graphic Novel 4 Books Collection Box Set (Hardcover) The cool dad who’s already binge-watched every season will appreciate this graphic-novel version of George R.R. Martin’s series. $100 at Amazon Buy $100 at Amazon Buy

For the Dad Who Loves a Kebab

Charcoal Companion Nonstick Kabob Grilling Baskets (Set of 4) For any grill master: Spritz them with oil, pop some vegetables in, and, baby, you’ve got a kebab going. $19 at Amazon Buy

For the Dad Who’s Into Home-Brewing

For the Dad Who Spends Too Much Money at La Colombe

For the Dad Who’s Getting Off of Coffee Completely

Matcha Tea Gift Set A less jittery approach to caffeine that will suit someone who doesn’t mind getting more hands on with whisking and stirring. $35 at Amazon Buy

For the Dad Who’s Adventurous With His Tea

For the Dad Who Wants to Be More Zen

For the Dad Who Works on Wall Street

For the Dad Who’s a Professor

For the Dad Who Camps

For the Dad Who Climbs

For the Dad Who’s Always Up for a Game

Franklin Sports Table Tennis to Go Set $20 (was $22, now 9% off) So he can challenge you to a match whether you’re at home or on a family trip. $20 at Amazon Buy $20 at Amazon Buy

For the Dad Who’s on the Red-eye Grind

For the Dad Who Could Always Use a Cold One

For the Dad Who Likes to Feel the Burn

For the Dad Who Always Helps You Move

For the Dad Who Loves a White Sneaker
